perturbation.original_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.changed_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA unless explicitly stated otherwise.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'except as the context otherwise requires' to 'unless explicitly stated otherwise' creates an in-text contradiction. The original implies the context can guide interpretation, while the modified version demands explicit statements. This adds an ambiguity in legal interpretation and potential for dispute. Does 'explicitly stated otherwise' require a formal amendment or can it be within an email?
perturbation.contradicted_text: As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA unless explicitly stated otherwise.

perturbation.original_text: b.As of the VNBZ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBZ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBZ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBJ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.changed_text: b.As of the VNBZ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBZ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBZ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBJ and/or ANRA regardless of context.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'except as the context otherwise requires' to 'regardless of context' creates an in-text contradiction. The original allows for contextual interpretation, while the modified version removes it. This adds ambiguity by demanding a literal reading of 'Company', even when it is obvious context suggests a different meaning. This change could mean references to one company now defaults as the other company. Which can lead to breaches, due to the lack of due dilligence.
perturbation.contradicted_text: As of the VNBZ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBZ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBZ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBJ and/or ANRA regardless of context.

perturbation.original_text: For clarity, upon the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement will remain in full force and effect in accordance with the terms thereof solely between the Nissin Parties and Autoliv AB with respect to the liquidation proceedings of ANRA.
perturbation.changed_text: For clarity, upon the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement will remain in full force and effect in accordance with the provisions thereof solely between the Nissin Parties and Autoliv AB regarding the liquidation proceedings of ANRA.
perturbation.explanation: By replacing 'terms' with 'provisions' it creates ambiguity about whether ALL terms remain enforceable or only specific legally binding obligations. 'Terms' is broader than 'provisions,' suggesting potential non-binding agreements within the agreement may no longer be relevant. Since it is regarding the agreement, it is creating a contradiction.
perturbation.contradicted_text: Except as expressly set forth in this Amendment and notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the JV Agreement (including Section 9.3.11 (Termination and Survival)), (a) effective as of the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement shall terminate in its entirety with respect to the Veoneer Parties and (b) after the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the Veoneer Parties shall cease to be a party to the JV Agreement and shall have no further obligations with respect thereto. For clarity, upon the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement will remain in full force and effect in accordance with the provisions thereof solely between the Nissin Parties and Autoliv AB regarding the liquidation proceedings of ANRA.
